Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 142nd overall pick, by Kansas City in 1965...
Injured on 6/8/1965 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Drafted in 5th round, 100th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1976...
Had first career hit (triple) on 7/14/1982, off Dennis Eckersley (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/9/1982, off Cardell Camper (HOU)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1984, hitting .471 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 1/31/1988 (Going to CHC: P B. Smith. Going to NYY: LF M. Young, 3B M. Funderburk, P D. Stieb, P B. Burns, C I. Calderon)...
Injured on 4/8/1989 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
